review: Much excitement was built up hearing and watching advertisements for this product, only to be let down...  Constant problems of more loading than watching.  I thought only in football that the last two minutes of a show can last half an hour.  Even when hard lined with an Ethernet cable.  Tried resetting several times with no difference.  It never stayed on the Wi-Fi and had to keep typing in the security code for access.  There are a lot of free stuff to watch.... most of which are not popular nor even heard of before.  I plan to try to return it for a new one and if the problem persists, I will return it for a refund
